title: Revenue of the U.S. employee wellness market 2011 to 2016
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in billion U.S. dollars, containing a total of 2 data points.
Overall Revenue in billion U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Revenue in billion U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2011 to 2016.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2011 and 2016.
Maximum Revenue in billion U.S. dollars, about 2.9 was reported at Year 2016
The lowest Revenue in billion U.S. dollars, of value 1.45 was reported at Year 2011
